title: Intro
description: Introduction to trading bootcamp - Learn the primary objectives and foundation principles of becoming a successful trader.
content:
In this lesson, you'll learn:

• The primary objective of a trading bootcamp
• How to focus on structured skill development
• The importance of discipline and rules
• Why psychology and risk management form the foundation
• Learning before earning approach

quiz.question: What is the primary objective of a trading bootcamp?
quiz.explanation: A trading bootcamp focuses on structured skill development, teaching systematic approaches to trading rather than gambling or seeking quick profits.

quiz.question: A trader should first focus on:
quiz.explanation: Understanding strategy comes before implementing signals. A solid foundation in strategy prevents costly mistakes.

quiz.question: Consistency in trading comes from:
quiz.explanation: Consistency is built through discipline and adherence to well-defined trading rules, not luck or random entries.

quiz.question: The foundation of trading success is:
quiz.explanation: Psychology and risk management are the cornerstones of successful trading. Indicators are just tools.

quiz.question: Learning before earning means:
quiz.explanation: Master the fundamentals and practice strategies before risking real capital. This protects your account and builds proper habits.
